chat.title: Chat
chat.welcomeDescription: Practice language through conversation with AI or connect with other learners
chat.tips:
üí° Use automatic translation to understand messages from other users
üéØ Join chat rooms suitable for your level
ü§ñ Chat with AI to practice conversation anytime
chat.shareRoomMessage: Join this chat room and start practicing!
chat.confirmKickMessage: Do you really want to remove this member?
chat.autoTranslateDesc: Automatically translate messages into your preferred language.
chat.showOriginalDesc: Display the original message alongside the translation.
chat.saveHistoryDesc: Keep a record of your conversations for later review.
chat.offlineTranslationDesc: Translate messages without an internet connection.
chat.soundNotificationsDesc: Play sounds for new messages and events.
chat.typingIndicatorDesc: Show when someone is typing a message.
chat.autoCorrectDesc: Automatically correct spelling mistakes in your messages.
chat.wordSuggestionsDesc: Show suggestions while typing to speed up messaging.
chat.clearHistoryDesc: Permanently delete all saved chat history.
chat.resetSettingsDesc: Restore all settings to their default values.
chat.translationInfoDesc: Learn how translations work and what languages are supported.
chat.actionSubtitle: Quick actions and tools for your chats.
chat.supportedLanguagesDesc: Choose from a wide range of languages for translation.
chat.tip1: Tip 1: Enable auto-translate for smoother communication.
chat.tip2: Tip 2: Save history to review important messages later.
chat.tip3: Tip 3: Use sound and vibration notifications to stay updated.
